page.title: 19Sutton in 100 Years.
page.content: I think that in 100 years Sutton will be a very modern place to live. I don't think our school will be here as children will be taught at home on a computer.I don't think there will be many shops,just a chemist where you will get your dinner as it will just be tablets in whatever flavour you choose.I think Sutton will have weird vehicles that will run on fresh air and everyone will have their own personal bomb.I think Sutton's main attraction will still be the sea and oil will still be drilled out of it "Sutton on Sea" might not be the name in a 100 years as it might be called "Sutton with the Sea" or "Sutton near the Sea".Sutton might have a massive harbour and lots of different things but even so I hope they don't spoil it because I like it as it is{-Sara {Cross.
